title: Bedwarsrel尝试链接数据库时发生报错
author: 幽冥冥
txt_content:
RT
Bedwarsrel尝试链接数据库时发生如下报错，插件版本为1.3.4

[09:28:26] [Server thread/WARN]: java.lang.NullPointerException
[09:28:26] [Server thread/WARN]:  at io.github.bedwarsrel.BedwarsRel.Statistics.PlayerStatisticManager.initializeDatabase(PlayerStatisticManager.java:60)
[09:28:26] [Server thread/WARN]:  at io.github.bedwarsrel.BedwarsRel.Statistics.PlayerStatisticManager.initialize(PlayerStatisticManager.java:48)
[09:28:26] [Server thread/WARN]:  at io.github.bedwarsrel.BedwarsRel.Main.loadStatistics(Main.java:459)
[09:28:26] [Server thread/WARN]:  at io.github.bedwarsrel.BedwarsRel.Main.onEnable(Main.java:175)
[09:28:26] [Server thread/WARN]:  at org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin.setEnabled(JavaPlugin.java:321)
[09:28:26] [Server thread/WARN]:  at org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPluginLoader.enablePlugin(JavaPluginLoader.java:340)
[09:28:26] [Server thread/WARN]:  at org.bukkit.plugin.SimplePluginManager.enablePlugin(SimplePluginManager.java:405)
[09:28:26] [Server thread/WARN]:  at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_8_R3.CraftServer.loadPlugin(CraftServer.java:356)
[09:28:26] [Server thread/WARN]:  at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_8_R3.CraftServer.enablePlugins(CraftServer.java:316)
[09:28:26] [Server thread/WARN]:  at net.minecraft.server.v1_8_R3.MinecraftServer.s(MinecraftServer.java:408)
[09:28:26] [Server thread/WARN]:  at net.minecraft.server.v1_8_R3.MinecraftServer.k(MinecraftServer.java:372)
[09:28:26] [Server thread/WARN]:  at net.minecraft.server.v1_8_R3.MinecraftServer.a(MinecraftServer.java:327)
[09:28:26] [Server thread/WARN]:  at net.minecraft.server.v1_8_R3.DedicatedServer.init(DedicatedServer.java:267)
[09:28:26] [Server thread/WARN]:  at net.minecraft.server.v1_8_R3.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:560)
[09:28:26] [Server thread/WARN]:  at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

replies.author: 浅念哥
replies.txt_content: 初始化数据库返回空，请检查你的配置文件是否正确以及测试数据库是否正常连接。

replies.author: 幽冥冥
replies.txt_content:
浅念哥 发表于 2017-5-22 16:38
初始化数据库返回空，请检查你的配置文件是否正确以及测试数据库是否正常连接。 ...
配置文件完全正确，特意上spigot的原config文件对照并填写

replies.author: qsxzaqq
replies.txt_content:
qsxzaqq 发表于 2017-5-26 20:48
在密碼外面加上引號例如，，， '密碼'
我也是這樣試出來的

replies.txt_content: 在密碼外面加上引號例如，，， '密碼'
